summary: Three part documentary that shows the insight look at the history of computers, from its rise in the 1970s to the beginning of the Dot-com boom of the late 1990s.
cast: Robert X. Cringely|Douglas Adams|Sam Albert|Paul Allen|Bill Atkinson|Steve Ballmer|Dan Bricklin|David Bunnell|Rod Canion|Jim Cannavino|Christine Comaford|Eddy Curry|Esther Dyson|Larry Ellison|Chris Espinosa|Gordon Eubanks|Lee Felsenstein|Bob Frankston|Harry Garland|Bill Gates|Adele Goldberg|Marv Goldschmitt|Andy Hertzfeld|Steve Jobs|Gary Kildall|Joe Krause|Bill Lowe|Roger Melen|Bob Metcalfe|Gordon Moore|Dana Muise|Doug Muise|Bill Murto|Ted Nelson|Tim Patterson|Vern Raburn|Jeff Raikes|Jean Richardson|Ed Roberts|Arthur Rock|Jack Sams|John Sculley|Rich Seidner|Charles Simonyi|Sparky Sparks|Claude Stern|Bob Taylor|Larry Tesler|Mark Van Haren|John E. Warnock|Jim Warren|Steve Wozniak
director: Writers: Robert X. Cringely (book), Robert X. Cringely (screenplay)
title: The Triumph of the Nerds: The Rise of Accidental Empires
